[ library(ic_kernel) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

ic_stat(++Command)

Enables/disables/resets/prints stats gathering information
Command
Statistics related command (eg. turn on, print)

Description

The available commands for controlling statistics gathering are...

on
Enables the recording of stats events.
off
Disables the recording of stats events.
reset
Zero's all stats event counters.
print
Prints, on standard output, the value of all registered stats event counters.

User programs may register their own events to be recorded by calling ic_stat_register_event/2.

See Also

ic_stat_register_event / 2, ic_stat_get / 1, ic_event / 1
